bibl.title: Psalm 30, 2-8 in Greek and Coptic. Joined Ostraca in London and Chicago.
bibl.note: Join three ostraca which once formed a sherd with 28 lines of writing: O. London Univ. College Inv. 62851 [ed.: W.E. CRUM, Varia Coptica (Aberdeen, 1939) No. 1] + O. Medinet Habu Inv. 935 [unpublished] + 1175 (= van Haelst 132; LDAB 3367). The ostracon may have served as a protective object.
RÖMER Cornelia Eva und Monika HASITZKA, Psalm 30, 2-8 in Greek and Coptic. Joined Ostraca in London and Chicago.
142.13 / 142.4 O. London Univ. College Inv. 62851 + O. Medinet Habu Inv. 935 + 1175
